story.chapter:
what a beautiful spring morning.
the birds are jumping, the fish are chirping,
and every little owl is asleep.

who is our bride-to-be?

dearly beloved,
we are gathered here today
to join together two numbers
in holy matrimony...

into this holy estate
these two numbers present now come to be joined,

as one number.

[bride], do you take [groom] to be your lawfully wedded husband?
[bride]: "I do!"

[groom], do you take [bride] to be your lawfully wedded wife?
[groom]: "I do!"

if any number can show just cause why these two numbers
may not be joined together,

let them speak now,

or forever
[bride] and [groom] sittin' in a tree, A-D-D-D-I-N-G!!!
